00015 class CSplineSegment: virtual public istd::IPolymorphic
00016 {
00017 public:
00018        typedef istd::IPolymorphic BaseClass;
00019 
00024        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetPointInSegment(double position) const;
00029        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetDerivationInSegment(double position) const;
00032        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetDerivationBegin() const;
00035        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetDerivationEnd() const;
00038        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetPointBegin() const;
00041        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetPointEnd() const;
00044        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetBezierPointBegin() const;
00047        virtual i2d::CVector2d GetBezierPointEnd() const;
00050        virtual bool IsCloserThan(const i2d::CVector2d position, double distance) const;
00053        virtual void GetHalfSegmentFirst(CSplineSegment& result) const;
00056        virtual void GetHalfSegmentSecond(CSplineSegment& result) const;
00057

00075 
00076 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointInSegment(double position) const
00077 {
00078        return ((m_a * position + m_b) * position + m_c) * position + m_d;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationInSegment(double position) const
00083 {
00084        return (m_a * (3 * position) + m_b * 2) * position + m_c;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationBegin() const
00089 {
00090        return m_c;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationEnd() const
00095 {
00096        return m_a * 3 + m_b * 2 + m_c;
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointBegin() const
00101 {
00102        return m_d;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointEnd() const
00107 {
00108        return m_a + m_b + m_c + m_d;
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointBegin() const
00113 {
00114        return m_d + m_c / 3;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointEnd() const
00119 {
00120        return m_c + m_d + (m_b - m_c) / 3;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentFirst(CSplineSegment& result) const
00125 {
00126        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00127        result.m_b = m_b * 0.25;
00128        result.m_c = m_c * 0.5;
00129        result.m_d = m_d;
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentSecond(CSplineSegment& result) const
00134 {
00135        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00136        result.m_b = m_a * 0.375 + m_b * 0.25;
00137        result.m_c = m_a * 0.375 + (m_b + m_c) * 0.5;
00138        result.m_d = m_a * 0.125 + m_b * 0.25 + m_c * 0.5 + m_d;
00139 }
